gui.common

Class GridBagConstraintsExt

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.GridBagConstraints
      • gui.common.GridBagConstraintsExt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GridBagConstraintsExt
extends java.awt.GridBagConstraints
    GridBagConstraintsExt is an extension of GridBagConstraints with an additional operation which makes it easy to reset the (x, y, width, height) properties in one shot.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
